comments:
Created an attachment (id=85112)
Session Info; Stack traces; screenshot

Following the BIRT Tutorial After creating a new Report Project;
Creating a Report using the menu driven navigation results in no Report dialogue boxes appearing.
Using the Wizard accessed from the "New" Icon in the tool bar allows the selection  or naming of the parent folder and a report name but the process either hangs with no further progress available by activating the buttons or results in an error dialogue box displayed stating the error reason as; "java.lang.nullPointerException"

I had posted to the birt.eclipse news group and tried Birt 2.2.1 All in one download at the request of Jason Whethersby and encountered the same problem.

I have attached stack traces and a screen shot.

Reassign to UI team for further investigation.

This is the stack trace from the attachement.
